iMath is a fun game that challenges you to use your brain and solve simple Math equations before the time is finished. The game is beautifully designed to enhance specific cognitive abilities which include attention, processing speed, and problem solving skills among players.

If you're looking to exercise that big 'ol brain of yours – iMath Learning for kids is just the right option. It offers basic and expert levels for kids – depending on the age group. With full emphasis on Math equations from simple to advanced stage, the game present players with a grid of numbers ranging from 1-9 highlighted in different colors. The game is timed so that you can track your performance easily.
